comments.content: I've been waiting for this. But I'm comforting myself with [this.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012043710/http:/www.theonion.com/content/video/how_will_the_end_of_print)

Ahhhh, yes! Bare naked text can be frightening to those under-thirty folks :-)  
Unless they are texting and driving
